snippet: The Taliban claimed responsibility for arranging the infiltration into the Afghan Army of the soldier responsible for Monday’s shooting.
abstract: British soldier helping to build new quarters for Afghan National Army at base in southern Afghanistan is fatally shot by Afghan soldier in first insider attack of 2013; Taliban claims responsibility for arranging infiltration into Afghan Army of soldier responsible for shooting.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and TAIMOOR SHAH
byline.contributor: Alissa J. Rubin reported from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan. Sangar Rahimi contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: The Taliban claimed responsibility for arranging the infiltration into the Afghan Army of the soldier responsible for Monday’s shooting.

headline.seo: British Soldier Killed by Afghan Soldier
headline.main: British Soldier Killed and Six Others Wounded in Attack by Afghan Soldier
